item.title: The E-Rupi Scheme: An Explainer
item.description: Recently, the PM launched the E-Rupi voucher programme. item.title: Bombay High Court stays the operation of Rule 9(1) and Rule 9(3) of IT Rules, 2021
item.description: The Court found these rules, which prescribed a Code of Ethics and a 3-tier grievance redressal mechanism, to be prima facie violative of Article 19(1)(a) and beyond the rule-making power conferred by the Parliament on the Government.

item.title: Explained: Supreme Court upholds Delhi Assemblies summons to Facebook
item.description: IFF explains the decision of the Supreme Court rejecting the plea filed by the Managing Director of Facebook India, Ajit Mohan against the summons issued by the Peace and Harmony Committee of Delhi Assembly which sought his appearance in an inquiry related to the Delhi Riots.

item.title: Live and let Live: The Supreme Court releases draft rules for live streaming of court proceedings
item.description: The e-Committee has released draft rules for live streaming of all proceedings in all courts. We strongly welcome this step, and offer small changes which can further improve the Rules.

item.title: DNA Bill : On democratic processes and dystopian outcomes #IFFExplainer #SaveOurPrivacy
item.description: The Standing Committee on Science and Technology recently submitted its report on the DNA Bill. Several concerns have been raised over the report, with two Committee members filing dissent notes. We decided to provide an explainer that breaks down the key issues with both the report and the Bill.
